data.title: Drug Abuse in Pakistan
data.meta_description: Drug addiction is a major health issue still growing across the world including Pakistan. Associated physico-mental health issues, large direct health costs, negative social impact, and increasing death rates render drug addiction a global epidemic. Among addictive...
